item.title: Creating a Blog with Hugo and a General Guide to Static Site Generation
item.description: Introduction In todayâ€™s world of Single Page Apps, server-side rendering, and new Javascript frameworks appearing before you can even finish adding the last hot one to your resume, the idea of building a static site might seem adorably quaint. But the idea that static sites are obsolete is not just naive, but simply untrue. Dynamic sites offer the sexy allure of almost limitless flexibility and powered the transition from Web 1.
